title: Why is Elton John's middle name Hercules? - Quora

response.answer_text: While his first and last names came from musicians- saxophonist Elton Dean and singer Long John Baldry, his band mates in the group Bluesology, Elton Hercules John’s middle name came from a horse. One of the most popular British sitcoms of the 1960s and 1970s was Steptoe And Son starring Wilfrid Brambell and Harry H. Corbett as Albert and Harold Steptoe, rag-and-bone men living in Shepherd’s Bush, London. The cart that Harold Steptoe used for his daily errands was pulled by a horse named Hercules. A young Reg Dwight was a fan of the show and when the time came to formally change his name by deed poll, he picked the name of the Steptoes’ horse.

“Elton” is from Elton Dean…Elton Dean - Wikipedia John is from Long john Baldry - Long John Baldry - Wikipedia - Reg Dwight’s bandleader in Bluesology Reginald Kenneth Dwight wanted a middle name the very opposite of Reg… So he chose the legend of power and strength - Hercules.
